item.title: A Norm-Shattering Indictment, and Amazon’s $2.5 Billion Settlement
4 Takeaways From Trump’s Securing of an Indictment Against Comey
item.description: The president’s pressure on the Justice Department to charge one of his highest-profile retribution targets could have profound consequences.

item.title: Kneecap Rapper’s Terrorism Charge Is Dismissed by U.K. Court
item.description: A rapper in the popular Irish-language group was charged over displaying a Hezbollah flag onstage.

item.title: Trump’s New Tariffs Shock Countries Reeling From His Chaotic Trade War
item.description: Throughout Asia, the source of about 40 percent of U.S. imports, countries have little to show for weeks of talks trying to finalize deals.
